StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIDeleteShipper]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100) DECLARE @ShipID int DECLARE @CandidateStatusID int
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME() SELECT @ShipId = SHIP_ID from SHIPPER JOIN CONTRACT on Shipper.CONTRACT_ID = CONTRACT.Contract_ID where Contract.NWA_ID = @NWAID Select @CandidateStatusID = Candidate_Status_id from Candidate_Status where nwa_id = @NWAID
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SHIPPER WHERE SHIP_ID = @ShipID) BEGIN --- BEGIN TRANSACTION
--- UPDATE THE USER LOGIN AND UPDATE_DATE BEFORE DELETING RECRUIT TRAINING DATA --- SO THAT THE RIGHT INFORMATION IS REFLECTED IN THE TLOG EXEC sp_MIDeleteRecruitTraining @ShipID = @ShipID, @UserLogin = @UserLogin
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN --- ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred dele.ng the recruit training record for Shipper ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @ShipID) + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- DELETE THE CANDIDATE_STATUS RECORD EXEC sp_MIDeleteCandidateStatus @NWAID = @NWAID, @CandidateStatusID = @CandidateStatusID, @UserLogin = @UserLogin
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN --- ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred dele.ng the status record for NWA ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @NWAID) + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- UPDATE THE USER LOGIN AND UPDATE_DATE BEFORE DELETING SHIPPER DATA --- SO THAT THE RIGHT INFORMATION IS REFLECTED IN THE TLOG UPDATE SHIPPER SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE SHIP_ID = @ShipID
--- DELETE THE SHIPPER DATA DELETE FROM SHIPPER WHERE SHIP_ID = @ShipID
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN --- ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred dele.ng the shipper record for Shipper ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @ShipID) + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 3, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- IF WE MAKE IT HERE COMMIT THE TRANSACTION --- COMMIT TRANSACTION END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
